BRK34 &#160; New York Stock Exchange Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&#8194; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#8194;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01 Other Events. On April&#160;25, 2024, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (&#8220;Berkshire&#8221;) issued (i) &#165;169,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 0.974% Senior Notes due 2027, (ii) &#165;22,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 1.143% Senior Notes due 2029, (iii) &#165;5,200,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 1.287% Senior Notes due 2030, (iv) &#165;35,300,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 1.457% Senior Notes due 2031, (v) &#165;9,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 1.680% Senior Notes due 2034, (vi) &#165;7,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 2.278% Senior Notes due 2044, and (vii) &#165;15,300,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 2.498% Senior Notes due 2054 ((i) through (vii)&#160;collectively, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) under a registration statement on Form S-3 under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#8220;Securities Act&#8221;), filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;Commission&#8221;) on January&#160;28, 2022 (Registration No.&#160;333-262384) (the &#8220;Registration Statement&#8221;). The Notes were sold pursuant to an&#160;underwriting agreement&#160;entered into on April&#160;18, 2024, by and among (a)&#160;Berkshire and (b)&#160;Merrill Lynch International and Mizuho Securities USA LLC. The Notes were issued under an Indenture, dated as of January&#160;28, 2022, by and among Berkshire, Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A. (the &#8220;Indenture&#8221;) and (i)&#160;an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of April&#160;25, 2024 by Berkshire with respect to its 0.974% Senior Notes due 2027 (the &#8220;2027 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (ii) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of April&#160;25, 2024 by Berkshire with respect to its 1.143% Senior Notes due 2029 (the &#8220;2029 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (iii) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of April&#160;25, 2024 by Berkshire with respect to its 1.287% Senior Notes due 2030 (the &#8220;2030 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (iv) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of April&#160;25, 2024 by Berkshire with respect to its 1.457% Senior Notes due 2031 (the &#8220;2031 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (v) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of April&#160;25, 2024 by Berkshire with respect to its 1.680% Senior Notes due 2034 (the &#8220;2034 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (vi) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of April&#160;25, 2024 by Berkshire with respect to its 2.278% Senior Notes due 2044 (the &#8220;2044 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;) and (vii)&#160;an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of April&#160;25, 2024 by Berkshire with respect to its 2.498% Senior Notes due 2054 (the &#8220;2054 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;) ((i) through (vii)&#160;collectively, the &#8220;Officers&#8217; Certificates&#8221;). The relevant terms of the Notes and the Indenture are further described under the caption &#8220;Description of the Notes&#8221; in the prospectus supplement relating to the Notes, dated April&#160;18, 2024, filed with the Commission by Berkshire on April&#160;22, 2024, pursuant to Rule&#160;424(b)(5) under the Securities Act and in the section entitled &#8220;Description of the Debt Securities&#8221; in the base prospectus relating to debt securities of Berkshire, dated January&#160;28, 2022, included in the Registration Statement, which descriptions are incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the Indenture is set forth in Exhibit 4.1 of the Registration Statement and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2027 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.2 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2029 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.3 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2030 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.4 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2031 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.5 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2034 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.6 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2044 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.7 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2054 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.8 and is incorporated herein by reference. The descriptions of the Indenture, the Officers&#8217; Certificates and the Notes in this report are summaries and are qualified in their entirety by the terms of the Indenture, the Officers&#8217; Certificates and the Notes, respectively. Item&#8201;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (incorporated by reference to Exhibit&#160;4.1 of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 (Registration No.&#160;333-262384) filed with the Commission on January&#160;28, 2022). &#8199;4.2 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of April&#160;25, 2024, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway&#160;Inc.&#8217;s 0.974% Senior Notes due 2027. &#8199;4.3 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of April&#160;25, 2024, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway&#160;Inc.&#8217;s 1.143% Senior Notes due 2029. &#8199;4.4 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of April&#160;25, 2024, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 1.287% Senior Notes due 2030. &#8199;4.5 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of April&#160;25, 2024, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 1.457% Senior Notes due 2031. &#8199;4.6 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of April&#160;25, 2024, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 1.680% Senior Notes due 2034. &#8199;4.7 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of April&#160;25, 2024, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 2.278% Senior Notes due 2044. &#8199;4.8 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of April&#160;25, 2024, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 2.498% Senior Notes due 2054. &#8199;5.1 &#160;&#160; Opinion of Munger, Tolles&#160;&amp; Olson LLP, dated April&#160;25, 2024, with respect to the Notes. 23.1 &#160;&#160; Consent of Munger, Tolles&#160;&amp; Olson LLP (included in Exhibit&#160;5.1). 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document).
